title: I currently have the iPhone 11 (base). I want to upgrade. Should I get the 11 Pro Max or the newer 12? - Quora

response.answer_text: I guess you should at least wait until we know what the next iPhone has to offer as it’s not out yet. And then you’ll probably find some good deals on the 11 Pro Max and you’ll know whether to get the old or the new phone. The 11 Pro Max will still be an incredible piece of mobile hardware in a month or even a year. It’s just basically up to you to decide if it’s enough for you or if the “iPhone 12” lineup, if it’s called that, has something to offer that you’d be really missing.
I phone 11 is terrific phone I phone 12 is going to be more feature laden, be patient the Apple watchers web sights are a buzz any day now
